EmailTemplate.name: RE: UPDATE - Re: Question - Re: MBO Partners Information (1359499024.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: UPDATE - Re: Question - Re: MBO Partners Information (1359499024.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Jack, I apologize for my delay in response. You do not need to have the LLC to operate through MBO, but It is good to have the name at least registered as belonging to you if you plan on using it for marketing purposes. Also, thank you for your kind words yesterday, I am feeling much better today luckily it doesnt hurt that is was 70 degrees here today and sunny so a little Vitamin D was much needed J. Have a great evening,Nicolette From: Jack Gavalas [mailto:jack5352@yahoo.com] Sent: Tuesday, January 29, 2013 4:15 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: UPDATE - Re: Question - Re: MBO Partners Information As of 2:30 pm Central, initialization of "The John Basil Gavalas Consultancy, LLC," is underway in the Office of the Texas Secretary of State, so I'm legal and keeping the LinkedIn page as-is. Cheers, Jack From: Jack Gavalas <jack5352@yahoo.com> To: Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> Sent: Tuesday, January 29, 2013 8:14 AM Subject: Question - Re: MBO Partners Information Forgot to ask: Can I just haul off and pick a name for my "company" and use it without registering with the state of Texas, as long as it's still a sole proprietorship (already have listed "The John Basil Gavalas Consultancy" on LinkedIn-- should I pull it?)? I may incorporate as an LLC, but haven't yet. Thanks! Jack From: Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> To: "jack5352@yahoo.com" <jack5352@yahoo.com> Sent: Monday, January 28, 2013 5:19 PM Subject: MBO Partners Information Hi Jack, It was a pleasure speaking with you today! Ive enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful as discussed: - You can view all the information we spoke over the phone by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-n-taylor.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVBavhIlvq65O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>.
- Here is a link to The Independent's Guide <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVBavhIlvq65O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> that we have recently released with a lot of great information about working as an Independent Consultant.
- In addition we have an index of recorded Webinars that will cover everything to do with working independently. You can see them by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVBavhIlvq65O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to me directly or schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVBavhIlvq65O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to speaking with you again soon! Have a great day, Nicolette___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&bbentley@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVBavhIlvq65O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVBavhIlvq65O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVBavhIlvq65O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. Weve got some serious perks youre eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=taylor&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVBavhIlvq65O6jlkDqOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to MBO Partners!
